pr_title: A quick and dirty fix of CTAS failures: unable to rename from viewfs

timeline.message: fix CTAS failures when using viewfs

Create temporary root folder if it does not exist.
Add unit test for the creating temporary folder

Create temporary root folder if it does not exist.
Add unit test for the creating temporary folder
Create temporary root folder if it does not exist and add unit test for creating temporary folder
Create temporary root folder when it does not exist and add unit test
Create temporary root folder when it does not exist and add unit test

timeline.author: zhenxiao

timeline.bodyText: could we have testcases for both targetPath exist and not exist?
timeline.author: zhenxiao

timeline.message: Add test cases for making temp dir under both exist and non-exist folder
